xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/685554-Day of Chaos: The Visual Effects of 'Dredd' 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nVpx5kiWMBfw2oTbYACpu5Crg3Y.jpg Featurette focuses on the special effects that permeate the film, looking at the theories behind the look, the concept art created during pre-production and what it took to shoot the film in 3D, with interviews with Mantle and his crew. Considering how big a part of the film the look is, this is a solid look behind the scenes. Day of Chaos: The Visual Effects of 'Dredd'
